answerText: Getulio Vargas[10] Vargas and his Estado Novo government ruled this South American country. His government should not be confused with the Estado Novo in Portugal, which also used to rule this nation.
heading: MUT |2014 | 1 | 21 | History | World | College
subject: History
question: Question: This man killed himself in the Catete Palace in 1954. For 10 points each: [10] Name this man who led his county from 1930 to 1945, before a brief return in the 1950's. He represented the end of the old caf√© com leite politics and as a dictator grew to oppose the fascist Integralism movement.
